title: Client / Game Issues. Can't enter queues and can't invite.
body:
For any type of queue I'm getting intermittent messages: "Something unexpected happened while trying to create your lobby".

If I can enter the 'find match' window I can't invite my friends. Have tried restarting clients and computers. Happening on Mac and Windows.

replies.body: Am now able to enter matches with some friends (delays). A friend on a low spec machine is having issues joining.

Having the same problem with opening a lobby, inviting friends and when we finally do get in, the queue times are so long it's not worth waiting any longer. Getting these issues on windows, and my friends are having the same problem on their clients.
happened to me earlier, and now when it's not, i've been in queue for 5 minutes.
Nah, not a mac problem, its happening on my cliet as well

Now able to enter queues and add some friends, however one particular friend i can't invite.

Delay in the invites being received too.

High server load?
Im on pc, and am having the same issue.
